sent.orig: An appropriate line of technology and appropriate interference value are obtained to guarantee quality offorging die.
sent.trans: 得到了保证电镦压模加工质量的合理工艺路线和合理的镶套过盈量。

sent.orig: The nurse will be assessing risk, so that appropriate interventions can be made at appropriate times.
sent.trans: 护士对风险进行评估，就可以在适当的时候采取适当的措施。

sent.orig: It must be dealt with at the appropriate time with appropriate means.
sent.trans: 这件事情必须在适当的时候用适当的手段予以处理。

sent.orig: It (the problem) must be dealt with by appropriate means at an appropriate time.
sent.trans: 这个问题必须在适当的时候以适当的方式予以处理。

sent.orig: Choose Age Appropriate Toys: Safe toys are synonomous with age appropriate toys.
sent.trans: 选择适当年龄的玩具：玩具是安全与孩子的年龄是对应的。
